sentences: Giorgia Gueglio (born 1973) is an Italian singer and founding member of the heavy metal band Mastercastle.
She started singing in 1990, following her passion for singers like David Coverdale, Robert Plant and Ian Gillan.
In 2004, she became a member of the gothic metal project Artisluna, featuring the first Labyrinth drummer Mattia Stancioiu, who was also the producer.
In 2008, she founded the band Mastercastle together with  Pier Gonella.
